data.title: Kirk Fordice - Previously held position: State of Mississippi (Jan. 1992-Jan. 2000), Governor - Biography
data.meta_description: See more about Kirk Fordice including contact information, employment history and other biographical information.
data.text:
LegiStorm is constantly adding new information on the people, places and reports in our database. In the past week, LegiStorm added:

281 new people

71 new organizations

283 new photos

2451 job history records for people in our database

503 education records for people in our database

1462 contact addresses, emails and URLs (LinkedIn, Facebook, etc.)

2 new people through the revolving door

68 new policy reports

160 new trips to our privately funded travel database

261 new personal financial disclosures

6385 new press releases

17 new town halls
